response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item holds significant value for us, reflecting over a decade of innovation and dedication to quality. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $999,999, aiming to make this exceptional opportunity accessible while ensuring we receive fair compensation for our investment. We believe this is a generous offer that respects both the value of our product and your budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 999999}
